column_descriptions.user_id: Identifier for the user
column_descriptions.aws_url: URL of the pictures stored in AWS
column_descriptions.date_created: Timestamp when the picture entry was created
column_descriptions.last_modified: Timestamp when the picture entry was last modified

user_referral.description: Tracks user referrals and their statuses.

column_descriptions.user_referral_id: Unique identifier for the user referral entry
column_descriptions.user_id: Identifier for the user making the referral
column_descriptions.hackerday_enroll_id: Identifier for enrollment in HackerDay, if applicable
column_descriptions.date_created: Timestamp when the referral entry was created
column_descriptions.last_modified: Timestamp when the referral entry was last modified

user_social_identity.description: Manages user social media identities for login purposes.

column_descriptions.user_social_identity_id: Unique identifier for the user social identity entry
column_descriptions.user_id: Identifier for the user
column_descriptions.social_login_provider_id: Identifier for the social login provider
column_descriptions.identifier: Unique identifier for the user on the social platform
column_descriptions.email: Email associated with the social identity
column_descriptions.is_active: Indicates if the social identity is currently active
column_descriptions.date_created: Timestamp when the social identity entry was created
column_descriptions.last_modified: Timestamp when the social identity entry was last modified

vote_answer.description: Records user votes on specific course answers.

column_descriptions.vote_answer_id: Unique identifier for the vote on an answer
column_descriptions.course_answer_id: Identifier for the answer being voted on
column_descriptions.user_id: Identifier for the user casting the vote
column_descriptions.vote: Value of the vote (e.g., upvote or downvote)
column_descriptions.date_created: Timestamp when the vote entry was created
column_descriptions.last_modified: Timestamp when the vote entry was last modified

vote_question.description: Records user votes on specific course questions.

column_descriptions.vote_question_id: Unique identifier for the vote on a question
column_descriptions.course_question_id: Identifier for the question being voted on
column_descriptions.user_id: Identifier for the user casting the vote
column_descriptions.vote: Value of the vote (e.g., upvote or downvote)
column_descriptions.favorite: Indicates if the question is marked as favorite
column_descriptions.date_created: Timestamp when the vote entry was created
column_descriptions.last_modified: Timestamp when the vote entry was last modified
